title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.4 - Participation by minority group members and women
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.4 - Participation by minority group members and women

State Regulations

All awards of payments, grants or loans of over
$100,000 shall require the eligible applicant, for projects in which bids are
required, to submit for approval of the corporation a utilization plan as
defined in section 310(9) of the New York State Executive Law (Executive Law)
prior to the award of a payment, grant or loan. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1903.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
